item.title: Chersonissos Travel Guide (Heraklion (regional unit)/Crete/Greece/Europe)
item.description: Explore the culturally rich and naturally stunning town of Chersonissos in Crete with this comprehensive tour guide. Learn about its must-visit places, best hiking or biking routes, where to stay, what to buy, local customs, safety precautions, transportation options, and nearby destinations.
